title: Weird metal that's also glass is insanely bouncy

media:group.media:title: Weird metal that's also glass is insanely bouncy
media:group.media:description:
Get 50% off ANY KiwiCo crate: https://kiwico.com/stevemould50

This amorphous metal has a coefficient or restitution or 0.99 when paired with a ball bearing. It's like watching a glitch in the matrix!

Thanks to Grand Illusions for lending me the atomic trampoline: https://www.grand-illusions.com

Here's my video about heat treating metals: https://youtu.be/xuL2yT-B2TM

You can buy my books here:
https://stevemould.com/books

You can support me on Patreon and get access to the exclusive Discord:
https://www.patreon.com/stevemould
